anya-e0901n0:5_1: paṭhamamahādhammasaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā
anya-e0901n0:6_1: paṭhamamahādhammasaṃgītiyaṃ bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n0:8_1: dvīsu bhante dhammesu suttantābhidhammapiṭakesu paṭhamaṃ suttantaṃ piṭakaṃ dhammaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n0:10_0: Vissajjanā – pañcasu bhante nikāyesu paṭhamaṃ dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n0:11_1: dīghanikāyepi āvuso tayo vaggā catuttiṃsā ca suttāni,
anya-e0901n0:11_2: tesu kataraṃ vaggaṃ katarañca suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n0:12_1: dīghanikāyepi bhante tīsu vaggesu paṭhamaṃ sīlakkhandhavaggaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:12_2: catuttiṃsatiyā ca suttesu paṭhamaṃ brahmajālasuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n0:14_1: sādhu sādhu āvuso mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgāyituṃ pubbakiccāni samārabhāma…,
anya-e0901n0:14_2: tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena brahmajālasuttaṃ kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:15_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ rājāgārake bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:17_0: Vissajjanā – suppiyañca bhante paribbājakaṃ brahmadattañca māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:19_2: suppiyo hi bhante anekapariyāyena buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati saṅghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
anya-e0901n0:19_3: suppiyassa pana paribbājakassa antevāsī brahmadatto māṇavo anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati dhammassa
anya-e0901n0:22_0: Vissajjanā – tayo bhante tattha anusandhayo, eko avaṇṇānusandhi, dve vaṇṇānusandhiyo.
anya-e0901n0:24_0: Pucchā – tatthāvuso paṭhame anusandhimhi kathaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ saṃkhepato kathehi.
anya-e0901n0:25_1: paṭhame bhante anusandhimhi avaṇṇe manopadosaṃ nivāretvā,
anya-e0901n0:26_0: Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ,
anya-e0901n0:26_1: dhammassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ,
anya-e0901n0:26_2: tatra tumhehi na āghāto appaccayo na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā…
anya-e0901n0:28_2: sādhu kho bhagavā attanā paramukkaṃ sāgatakhantīguṇasamannāgato attano sāvakabhūte amhepi tattha samādāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:28_3: attanā ca lokadhammesu aniñjanasabhāvo amhākampi tathattāya ovādamadāsi,
anya-e0901n0:29_1: dutiye pana bhante anusandhimhi vaṇṇe cetaso uppilāvitattaṃ nisedhetvā,
anya-e0901n0:29_4: puthujjanassa vaṇṇabhūmibhūtāni tīṇi sīlāni vitthārato bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0901n0:30_0: Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ,
anya-e0901n0:30_3: tatra tumhehi na ānando na somanassaṃ na cetaso abhiraddhi karaṇīyā –
anya-e0901n0:32_3: taṃ attano suparisuddhasīlaṃ dassetvā parepi tattha niyojesi,
anya-e0901n0:32_4: tatiye panāvuso anusandhimhi kathaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:33_1: tatiye pana bhante anusandhimhi dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo sabbaññuta ñāṇena vitthārato vibhajitvā,
anya-e0901n0:33_5: micchādiṭṭhigatikassa desanājālato avimuttabhāvaṃ desanājālato vimuttassa natthikabhāvañca vibhāvetvā,
anya-e0901n0:34_1: yāvassa kāyo ṭhassati tāva naṃ dakkhanti devamanussā,
anya-e0901n0:34_2: kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā na naṃ dakkhanti devamanussā.
anya-e0901n0:36_2: sādhu kho bhagavā attanā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo ca cha phassāyatanāni ca dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni ca
anya-e0901n0:36_3: sabbaso parijānitvā tesaṃ parijānanatthāya paresampi tathattāya dhammaṃ pakāseti,
anya-e0901n0:36_4: suttañca nāma āvuso catunnaṃ suttanikkhepānaṃ aññataravaseneva nikkhittaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:36_5: tasmā tesu idaṃ suttaṃ katarena suttanikkhepena bhagavatā nikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:37_0: Vissajjanā – catūsu bhante suttanikkhepesu aṭṭhuppattinikkhepana idaṃ suttaṃ nikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:39_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0901n0:42_0: Pucchā – atthi nu kho āvuso ettha koci viraddhadosā, yena pacchimā janā micchāatthaṃ gaṇheyyuṃ.
anya-e0901n0:45_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena sāmaññaphalasuttaṃ kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:46_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavane bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:48_0: Vissajjanā – raññā bhante māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:49_1: taṃ panāvuso suttaṃ catunnaṃ suttanikkhepānaṃ katarena suttanikkhepena bhagavatā nikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:50_0: Vissajjanā – catunnaṃ bhante suttanikkhepānaṃ pucchāvasikena suttanikkhepena nikkhitaṃ bhagavatā.
anya-e0901n0:52_0: Pucchā – sā panāvuso pucchā kenākārena samuppannā.
anya-e0901n0:53_1: rājā bhante māgadho ajāsattu vedehiputto tadahuposathe pannarase komudiyā cātumāsiniyā puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṃkami,
anya-e0901n0:53_2: upasaṃkamitvā bhagavantaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme saṃdiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0901n0:53_3: evaṃ kho sā bhante pucchā uppannā.
anya-e0901n0:55_0: Kaṃ nukhvajja samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā payirupāseyyāma….
anya-e0901n0:58_0: Tvaṃ pana samma jīvaka kiṃ tuṇhīsi –
anya-e0901n0:59_0: Ayaṃ deva amhākaṃ bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho amhākaṃ ambavane viharati.
anya-e0901n0:60_0: Taṃ kho pana bhagavantaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno
anya-e0901n0:60_1: sugato lokavidū anuttaropurisadammasārathi satthādevamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā”ti.
anya-e0901n0:61_0: Taṃ devo bhagavantaṃ payirupāsatu, appevanāma devassa bhagavantaṃ payirupāsato cittaṃ pasīdeyya.
anya-e0901n0:62_0: Tena hi samma jīvaka hatthiyānāni kappāpehi.
anya-e0901n0:63_0: Kappitāni kho te deva hatthiyānāni, yassa dāni kālaṃ maññasi.
anya-e0901n0:65_0: Kicci maṃ samma jīvaka na vañcesi, kacci maṃ samma jīvaka na palambhesi….
anya-e0901n0:66_0: Mā bhāyi mahārāja, mā bhāyi mahārāja….
anya-e0901n0:67_0: Na taṃ deva vañcemi, na taṃ deva palambhāmi….
anya-e0901n0:69_1: eso mahārāja bhagavā majjhimaṃ thambhaṃ nissāya puratthābhimukho nisinno purakkhato bhikkhusaṅghassa….
anya-e0901n0:70_0: Iminā me upasamena udayabhaddo kumāro samannāgato hotu…
anya-e0901n0:71_0: Agamā kho tvaṃ mahārāja yathā pemaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:72_0: Puccheyyāmahaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ kiñcideva desaṃ sace me bhagavā okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya.
anya-e0901n0:74_0: Yathā nu kho imāni bhante puthusippāyatanāni,
anya-e0901n0:74_2: hatthārohā assārohā rathikā dhanuggahā celakā calakā piṇḍadāyakā (peyyāla) gaṇakā muddikā,
anya-e0901n0:74_4: te tena sippena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sippaphalaṃ jīvanti,
anya-e0901n0:74_8: mittāmacce sukhenti pīṇenti samaṇabrāhmaṇesu uddhaggikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhapenti sovaggikaṃ sukhavipākaṃ saggasaṃvattanikaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:74_9: sakkā nu kho bhante evameva diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ paññapetuṃ.
anya-e0901n0:75_1: tadā āvuso kathaṃ bhagavatā rājā ajātasattu vedehi putto paṭipucchito kathañca tena bhagavato ārocitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:76_1: “abhijānāsi no tvaṃ mahārāja imaṃ pañhaṃ aññe samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchitāti,
anya-e0901n0:76_5: bhāsassūti na kho me bhante garu,
anya-e0901n0:76_8: evaṃ kho bhante tadā bhagavatā rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehi putto paṭipucchito,
anya-e0901n0:76_9: evaṃ kho bhante tena tadā bhagavato ārocitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:78_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso pūraṇakassapassa santike pucchāvissajjanā ahosi.
anya-e0901n0:79_1: ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena pūraṇo kassapo tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0901n0:79_2: upasaṅkamitvā pūraṇaṃ kassapaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0901n0:79_3: atha kho bhante pūraṇo kassapo karoto kho mahārāja kārayato,
anya-e0901n0:79_6: socayato socāpayato (peyyāla) karoto na karīyati pāpaṃ tyādinā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa
anya-e0901n0:79_7: saṃdiṭṭhi kaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho samāno akiriyaṃ byākāsi,
anya-e0901n0:79_8: evaṃ kho bhante pūraṇassa kassapassa santike pucchāvissajjanā ahosi.
anya-e0901n0:81_0: Nissiriko vata āvuso pūraṇassa kassapassa vādo anatthasaṃhito jigucchanīyo ativiya bhayānako,
anya-e0901n0:81_1: ye tassa vacanaṃ sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ,
anya-e0901n0:81_2: tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya,
anya-e0901n0:83_1: purimadivase āvuso mayā sāmaññaphalasuttassa nidānapariyāpannāni pucchitabbaṭṭhānāni kānici kānici pucchitāni,
anya-e0901n0:83_3: ajja pana yathānuppattamakkhaligosāya vādato paṭṭhāya pucchissāmi,
anya-e0901n0:84_0: Gosālo raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:85_1: ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena makkhaligosālo tenupasaṃkami,
anya-e0901n0:85_2: upasaṃkamitvā makkhaliṃ gosālaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0901n0:85_3: atha kho bhante makkhaligosālo rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajātasattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ etadavoca “natthi mahārāja hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāya,
anya-e0901n0:85_5: Natthi mahārāja hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā,
anya-e0901n0:85_8: yāni bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti,
anya-e0901n0:85_9: tattha natthi ‘imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā aparipakkaṃ vā kammaṃ paripācessāmi,
anya-e0901n0:85_10: paripakkaṃ vā kammaṃ phussa phussa byantiṃ karissāmī’ti hevaṃ natthi.
anya-e0901n0:85_14: Seyyathāpi nāma suttapuṭṭhe khitte nibbeṭhiyamānameva paleti,
anya-e0901n0:85_15: evameva bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti,
anya-e0901n0:85_16: itthaṃ kho bhante rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa makkhaligosālo sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho samāno saṃsārasuddhiṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:87_0: Ayampi āvuso vādo nissirikoyeva anatthasaṃhito jigucchanīyo ati viya bhayānako,
anya-e0901n0:87_1: ye tassa vacanaṃ sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ,
anya-e0901n0:87_2: tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
anya-e0901n0:89_2: ajito pana āvuso kesakambalo raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:90_1: ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena ajito kesakambalo tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0901n0:90_2: upasaṅkamitvā ajitaṃ kesakambalaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0901n0:90_3: atha kho bhante ajito kesakambalo rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajātasattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ etadavoca “natthi mahārāja dinnaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:90_13: ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedenti.
anya-e0901n0:90_14: (Peyyāla) bāle ca paṇḍite ca kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassantī”ti.
anya-e0901n0:90_15: Itthaṃ kho bhante rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa ajito kesakambalo sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho samāno ucchedaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:92_2: ye tassa vacanaṃ sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ,
anya-e0901n0:92_3: tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
anya-e0901n0:94_2: pakudho pana āvuso kaccāyano raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:95_1: ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena pakudho kaccāyano tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0901n0:95_2: upasaṅkamitvā pakudhaṃ kaccāyanaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0901n0:95_3: atha kho bhante pakudho kaccāyano rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajāsattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ etadavoca “sattime mahārāja
anya-e0901n0:95_4: kāyā akaṭā akaṭavidhā animmitā animmātā vañcā kūṭaṭṭhā esikaṭṭhāyitā,
anya-e0901n0:95_8: nālaṃ aññamaññassa sukhāya vā dukkhāya vā sukhadukkhāya vā.
anya-e0901n0:95_13: Ime sattakāyā akaṭā akaṭavidhā animmitā animmātā vañcyā kūṭaṭṭhā esikaṭṭhāyitā,
anya-e0901n0:95_17: nālaṃ aññamaññassa sukhāya vā dukkhāya vā sukhadukkhāya vā.
anya-e0901n0:95_18: Tattha natthi hantā vā ghātetā vā,
anya-e0901n0:95_24: Itthaṃ kho bhante rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa pakudho kaccāyano sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho samāno aññena aññaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:97_0: Ayampi kho āvuso vādo purimavādoviya nissirikoyeva anatthasaṃhito jigucchanīyo ativiya bhayānako.
anya-e0901n0:99_2: nigaṇṭho panāvuso nāṭaputto raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:100_1: ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṃkami,
anya-e0901n0:100_2: upasaṃkamitvā nigaṇṭhaṃ nāṭaputtaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0901n0:100_3: atha kho nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajātasattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ etadavoca,
anya-e0901n0:101_1: idha mahārāja nigaṇṭho sabbavārivārito ca hoti,
anya-e0901n0:101_5: Evaṃ kho mahārāja nigaṇṭho cātuyāmasaṃvarasaṃvuto hoti,
anya-e0901n0:101_6: yato kho mahārāja nigaṇṭho evaṃ cātuyāmasaṃvarasaṃvuto hoti.
anya-e0901n0:101_7: Ayaṃ vuccati mahārāja nigaṇṭho gatatto ca yatatto ca ṭhitatto cā”ti.
anya-e0901n0:101_8: Itthaṃ kho bhante rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho samāno cātuyāmasaṃvaraṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:103_0: Etassa panāvuso vāde koci sāsanānulomavādo atthi,
anya-e0901n0:103_2: seyyathāpi bhojanaṃ gūthamissaṃ gārayhoyeva ārakā parivajjitabboyeva,
anya-e0901n0:105_2: sañcayo panāvuso belaṭṭhaputto sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:106_1: ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0901n0:106_3: “yathā nu kho imāni bho sañcaya puthusippāyatanāni,
anya-e0901n0:106_6: sakkā nu kho bho sañcaya evameva diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ paññapetu”nti,
anya-e0901n0:106_7: evaṃ vutte bhante sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajātasattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ etadavoca.
anya-e0901n0:107_0: “Atthi parolokoti iti ce maṃ pucchasi, atthi paro lokoti iti ce me assa, atthi paro
anya-e0901n0:108_6: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti iti ce maṃ pucchasi,
anya-e0901n0:108_7: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti iti ce me assa,
anya-e0901n0:108_8: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti iti te naṃ byākareyyaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:108_14: Itthaṃ kho bhante rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho samāno vikkhepaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:110_0: Sabbepi āvuso ete channaṃ satthārānaṃ vādā nissirikāyeva jigucchanīyāyeva anatthasaṃhitāyeva,
anya-e0901n0:110_1: bālānaṃ bhiyyoso mattāya sammohāya saṃvattanti anatthāya.
anya-e0901n0:111_1: sveyeva bhagavatā vuttaṃ paṇītaṃ pasaṭṭhaṃ sandiṭṭhikaphalaṃ pucchāma.
anya-e0901n0:112_1: purimadivasesu āvuso sāmaññaphalasuttassa pubbabhāge yāva chasatthāramicchāvādapariyosānaṃ pucchanavissajjanaṃ amhehi kataṃ,
anya-e0901n0:112_2: ajja pana yathānuppattaṃ bhagavatā desitasāmaññaphalasuttādhikāre pucchāvissajjanaṃ karissāma.
anya-e0901n0:112_3: Bhagavā pana āvuso raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:113_1: bhagavā bhante tidhā vibhajitvā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho byākāsi.
anya-e0901n0:114_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattuno vedehiputtassa paṭhamaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi.
anya-e0901n0:115_1: dāsaṃ bhante pabbajitaṃ upamābhāvena niddisitvā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa bhagavā paṭhamaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi.
anya-e0901n0:116_1: yathā nu kho imāni bhante puthusippāyatanāni seyyathidaṃ…pe…
anya-e0901n0:116_2: sakkā nu kho bhante eva meva diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ paññapetuṃ –
anya-e0901n0:117_2: yatrahi nāma dāsopi nihīnajacco evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane pabbajitvā attano issarabhūtena raññāpi vandanīyattaṃ garukaraṇīyattaṃ pāpuṇissati,
anya-e0901n0:118_1: kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattuno vedehiputtassa dutiyaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi.
anya-e0901n0:119_1: kassakaṃ bhante pabbajitaṃ upamābhāvena dassetvā bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi.
anya-e0901n0:120_2: yatrahi nāma kassa kopi guṇarahito evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane pabbajitvā raṭṭhadhipatinā manussaloke
anya-e0901n0:121_1: kathañcā panāvuso bhagavā purimehi sandiṭṭhikasāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ rañño desesi.
anya-e0901n0:122_1: bhagavā bhante buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya kulaputtassa pabbajita bhāvaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:122_9: tāhi tāhi upamāhi vitthārato vibhajitvā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n0:122_10: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.
anya-e0901n0:123_0: Sakkā pana bhante diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:123_1: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca paññapetuṃ.
anya-e0901n0:124_0: Sakkā mahārājā, tena hi mahārāja suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasikarohi bhāsissāmi.
anya-e0901n0:125_2: kathañca bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattuno vedehiputtassa cūḷasīlaṃ vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n0:126_2: Idha mahārāja bhikkhu pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno,
anya-e0901n0:126_4: Idampissa hoti sīlasmiṃ” evamādinā bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa chabbīsatiyā ākārehi cūḷasīlaṃ vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n0:127_1: sādhu sādhu āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane saddhāpabbājito iminā ca cūḷasīlena samannāgato vihareyya.
anya-e0901n0:130_1: kathaṃ panāvuso rañño māgadhassa ajātasattuno vedehiputtassa majjhimasīlañca mahāsīlañca vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n0:131_1: “yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpaṃ bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhaṃ anuyuttā viharanti.
anya-e0901n0:131_3: Mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījameva pañcamaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:131_5: Idampissa hoti sīlasmiṃ” evamādinā bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa majjhimasīlañca
anya-e0901n0:132_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane saddhāpabbajito evaṃ ariyena sīlena samannāgato vihareyya.
anya-e0901n0:133_1: kathaṃ panāvuso ariyaṃ indriyasaṃvarañca ariyaṃ satisampajaññañca ariyaṃ santosañca bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n0:134_1: idha mahārāja bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nanubyañjanaggāhī,
anya-e0901n0:134_2: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0901n0:135_0: Idha mahārāja bhikkhu satisampajaññena samannāgato hoti, abhikkante paṭikkante sampajanakārī hoti,
anya-e0901n0:136_3: asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti,
anya-e0901n0:136_5: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti,
anya-e0901n0:136_6: evaṃ kho mahārāja bhikkhu satisampajaññena samannāgato hoti.
anya-e0901n0:137_1: idha mahārāja bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena.
anya-e0901n0:138_0: Evamādinā bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa ariyañca indriyesuguttadvārataṃ
anya-e0901n0:138_1: ariyañca satisampajaññaṃ ariyañca santosaṃ vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n0:139_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane saddhāpabbajito iminā ca ariyena indriyasaṃvarena samannāgato,
anya-e0901n0:140_0: Samannāgato, imāya ca ariyāya santuṭṭhiyā samannāgato vihareyya.
anya-e0901n0:141_1: kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa nīvaraṇapahānaṃ vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n0:142_5: vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajati araññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapattaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:142_6: So pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhuñjitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
anya-e0901n0:142_7: So abhijjhaṃ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati…pe…
anya-e0901n0:142_8: tassime pañca nīvaraṇe pahīne attani samanupassato pāmojjaṃ jāyati,
anya-e0901n0:142_13: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa nīvaraṇappahānaṃ vibhajitvā vitthārato desesi.
anya-e0901n0:143_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane saddhāpabbajito evaṃ pañcanīvaraṇe pajahitvā tehi cittaṃ visodhetvā vihareyya.
anya-e0901n0:144_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa paṭhamaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi,
anya-e0901n0:145_1: so vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati…pe…
anya-e0901n0:145_2: idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca
anya-e0901n0:146_1: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa paṭhamaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n0:146_2: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.
anya-e0901n0:147_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsanasaṅkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā evaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0901n0:148_0: Upasampajja vivekajena pītisukhena attano kāyaṃ abhisandeyya parisandeyya paripūreyya.
anya-e0901n0:149_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā dutiyañca tatiyañca catutthañca sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi,
anya-e0901n0:150_1: puna ca paraṃ mahārāja bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ
anya-e0901n0:150_2: avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃjhānaṃ upasampajja viharati evamādinā bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa
anya-e0901n0:150_3: ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa dutiyañca tatiyañca catutthañca sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi
anya-e0901n0:151_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsanasaṅkhāte dhammavinaye saddhāpabbajito evaṃ dutiyajhānañca
anya-e0901n0:151_2: tatiyajhānañca catutthajhānañca upasampajja tehi jhānasukhehi attano kāyaṃ abhisandetvā parisandetvā
anya-e0901n0:152_1: kathañca panāvuso bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi,
anya-e0901n0:153_1: so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite ānañjappatte
anya-e0901n0:153_3: so evaṃ pajānāti “ayaṃ kho me kāyo rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātāpettikasambhavo odanakummāsūpacayo aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo,
anya-e0901n0:153_4: idañca pana me viññāṇaṃ ettha sitaṃ ettha paṭibandhanti…pe…
anya-e0901n0:153_5: idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
anya-e0901n0:153_6: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n0:153_7: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.
anya-e0901n0:154_0: Suññāraṃgā paviṭṭhassa, santacittassa bhikkhuno. Amānusī ratī hoti, sammādhammaṃ vipassato.
anya-e0901n0:155_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsanasaṅkhāte dhammavinaye saddhāpabbajito evaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ
anya-e0901n0:155_2: uppādetvā evaṃ ñāṇadassanena samannāgato hutvā vihareyya.
anya-e0901n0:156_1: kathañcāvuso bhagavā aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi,
anya-e0901n0:157_1: so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite ānañjappatte
anya-e0901n0:157_2: manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmānāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti,
anya-e0901n0:157_3: so imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ ahīnindriyaṃ evamādinā bhante
anya-e0901n0:157_4: bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi
anya-e0901n0:158_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsanasaṅkhāte dhammavinaye saddhāpabbajito evaṃ visesena manomayañāṇena samannāgato vihareyya.
anya-e0901n0:159_1: bhagavā āvuso rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa jhānacatukkasaṅkhātañca paṭhama dutiya vijjāsaṅkhātañca
anya-e0901n0:160_1: so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite ānañjappatte
anya-e0901n0:160_6: idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañcāti.
anya-e0901n0:160_7: Itthaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n0:160_8: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.
anya-e0901n0:161_2: yatrahi nāma evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane pabbajitvā sāvakopi sammāpaṭipanno evaṃ mahiddhikaṃ evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ iddhividhañāṇampi paccanubhossati.
anya-e0901n0:162_1: kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavā aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi,
anya-e0901n0:163_1: so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite ānañjappatte
anya-e0901n0:163_3: so dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkanta mānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāti dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike ca…pe…

anya-e0901n0:163_5: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n0:163_6: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.
anya-e0901n0:164_3: yatrahi nāma evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane saddhāpabbajito sammāpaṭipanno sāvakopi evaṃ visesaṃ dibbasotañāṇaṃ paṭilabhissati.
anya-e0901n0:165_1: kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavā aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi,
anya-e0901n0:166_1: so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte.
anya-e0901n0:167_1: so parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti,
anya-e0901n0:167_2: sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittanti pajānāti,
anya-e0901n0:167_3: vītarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ vītarāgaṃ cittanti pajānāti…pe…
anya-e0901n0:167_4: idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
anya-e0901n0:167_5: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n0:167_6: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.

anya-e0901n0:169_1: kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavā aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi,
anya-e0901n0:170_1: so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite ānañjappatte
anya-e0901n0:170_6: idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
anya-e0901n0:170_7: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n0:170_8: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.
anya-e0901n0:171_3: yatrahi nāma evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane pabbajitvā sāvakopi sammāpaṭipanno evaṃ visesaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ paṭilabhissati.
anya-e0901n0:172_1: kathañca panāvuso bhagavā sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi,
anya-e0901n0:173_1: so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
anya-e0901n0:173_3: so dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe
anya-e0901n0:173_4: dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammupage satte pajānāti…pe…
anya-e0901n0:173_5: idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
anya-e0901n0:173_6: Itthaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n0:173_7: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.
anya-e0901n0:174_3: yatrahi nāma evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane pabbajito sāvakopi sammāpaṭipanno evaṃ visesaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ paṭilabhissati.
anya-e0901n0:175_0: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavā pariyosāne uttaritaraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi.
anya-e0901n0:176_1: so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte
anya-e0901n0:176_3: idaṃ kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
anya-e0901n0:176_4: Imasmā ca pana mahārāja sandiṭṭhikā sāmaññaphalā aññaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ uttaritaraṃ vā paṇītataraṃ vā natthīti.
anya-e0901n0:176_5: Itthaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa pariyosānaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n0:176_6: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.
anya-e0901n0:177_2: yaṃ bhikkhu buddhasāsane saddhāpabbajito evaṃ svākhāte dhammavinaye sammāpaṭipanno āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ pāpuṇitvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
anya-e0901n0:178_1: kathaṃ panāvuso rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto imissā desanāya pariyosāne bhagavati ca desanāyañca pasanno pasannākāraṃ akāsi,
anya-e0901n0:179_1: evaṃ vutte bhante māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca,
anya-e0901n0:179_7: ayañhi bhante rājā pitumāritakālato paṭṭhāya neva rattiṃ na divā niddaṃ paṭilabhati,
anya-e0901n0:179_8: satthāraṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā imāya madhurāya ojavantiyā dhammadesanāya sutakālato paṭṭhāya niddaṃ paṭilabhati,
anya-e0901n0:179_10: puthujjanikāya saddhāya samannāgato nāma iminā raññā sadiso nāhosi,
anya-e0901n0:179_11: anāgate pana vijitāvī nāma paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissati.
anya-e0901n0:179_12: Evaṃ kho bhante rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto desanāpariyosāne pasanno pasannākāramakāsi,
anya-e0901n0:181_1: tenāvuso bhagavā jānatā arahatā passatā sammāsambuddhena ambaṭṭhaṃ ṭāma suttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:182_1: kosalesu bhante janapade icchānaṅgale nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāme ambaṭṭhaṃ nāma māṇavaṃ brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa antevāsiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:184_0: Pucchā – soṇadaṇḍaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:185_0: Vissajjanā – aṅgesu bhante janapade campāyaṃ soṇadaṇḍaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:187_0: Pucchā – kūṭadantaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:188_0: Vissajjanā – magadhesu bhante khāṇumate nāma brāhmaṇagāme kūṭadanta brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:190_0: Pucchā – mahāliṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:191_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante oṭṭhaddhaṃ nāma licchaviṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.

anya-e0901n0:194_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante dve pabbajite ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:196_0: Pucchā – mahāsīhanādaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:197_0: Vissajjanā – uruññāyaṃ bhante kaṇṇakathale acelaṃ kassapaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:199_0: Pucchā – poṭṭhapādaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:200_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante poṭṭhapādañca paribbājakaṃ cittañca hatthisāriputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:202_0: Pucchā – subhasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:203_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmatā ānandena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena subhaṃ māṇavaṃ todeyyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:205_0: Pucchā – kevaṭṭaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:206_0: Vissajjanā – nāḷandā yaṃ bhante kevaṭṭaṃ gahapatiputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:208_0: Pucchā – lohiccasutta panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:209_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante janapade sālavatikāyaṃ lohiccaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:211_0: Pucchā – tevijjasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:212_1: kosalesu bhante manasākaṭe nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāme vāseṭṭhaṃ bhāradvājaṃ māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:214_1: tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mahāpadānasuttaṃ dīghanikāye mahāvagge porāṇakehi
anya-e0901n0:214_2: saṅgitikārehi paṭhamaṃ saṅgitaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:215_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:215_2: sambahulānaṃ bhante bhikkhūnaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṃ maṇḍalamāḷe sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ
anya-e0901n0:217_0: Pucchā – mahānidānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:218_1: kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:218_2: āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “acchariyaṃ bhante,
anya-e0901n0:219_1: atha ca pana me uttānakuttānako viya khāyatī”ti,
anya-e0901n0:221_4: tasmā taṃ antarābhedavasena vibhajja paricchijja paricchijja pucchissāmi,
anya-e0901n0:222_0: Rājūnaṃ aparihāniyadhammadesanā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.

anya-e0901n0:223_3: ajātasattu vedehiputto vajjī abhiyātukāmo so evamāha ahaṃ hime vajjī evaṃ mahiddhike evaṃ mahānubhāve
anya-e0901n0:223_4: ucchecchāmi vajjī vināsessāmi vajjī anayabyasanaṃ āpādessāmī vajjī”ti tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n0:224_0: Pucchā – bhikkhūnaṃ panāvuso aparihāniyadhammadesanā bhagavatā kattha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n0:225_0: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃyeva bhante rājagahe tasmiṃyeva vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n0:227_0: Pucchā – dhammādāso āvuso dhammapariyāyo bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsito.
anya-e0901n0:228_1: nātike bhante giñjakāvasathe āyasmantaṃ ānanda ārabbha bhāsito,
anya-e0901n0:228_2: āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nātikiyānaṃ dvādasannaṃ puggalānaṃ gatiabhisamparāyaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0901n0:230_0: Pucchā – attadīpadhammadesanā panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n0:231_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante veḷuvagāmake āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitā,
anya-e0901n0:231_2: āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavato gilānavuṭṭhitassa aciravuṭṭhitassa gelaññā bhagavato gelaññena attano khedapattakāraṇaṃ ārocesi,
anya-e0901n0:233_1: bhagavatā āvuso purima dutiyadivase pucchitavissajjitakkamena attadīpadhammadesanañca aññāni ca dhammadesanāni
anya-e0901n0:233_2: kathetvā pariniṭṭhita sabbabuddhakiccena āyusaṅkhāro kattha ossaṭṭho.
anya-e0901n0:234_1: vesāliyaṃ bhante cāpāle cetiye mārena pāpimatā yācito bhagavā satena sampajānena āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭho.
anya-e0901n0:235_0: “Parinibbātu dāni bhante bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato, parinibbāna kālo dāni bhante bhagavato.
anya-e0901n0:236_2: ito tiṇṇaṃ māsānaṃ accayena tathāgato parinibbāyissati.
anya-e0901n0:238_0: Pucchā – catumahāpadesadhammadesanā panāvuso bhagavatā kattha bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n0:239_0: Vissajjanā – bhoganagare bhante ānande cetiye bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n0:240_0: Paripakko vayo mayhaṃ, parittaṃ mama jīvitaṃ. Pahāya vo gamissāmi, kataṃ me saraṇamattano.
anya-e0901n0:242_0: Pucchā – catusaṃvejanīyakathā panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n0:243_1: kusinārāyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitā,
anya-e0901n0:243_2: āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “pubbe bhante disāsu vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhū āgacchanti tathāgataṃ dassanāya,
anya-e0901n0:243_3: te mayaṃ labhāma manobhāvanīye bhikkhū dassanāya,
anya-e0901n0:243_5: Bhagavato pana mayaṃ bhante accayena na labhissāma manobhāvanīye bhikkhū dassanāya,
anya-e0901n0:244_0: Yehi keci ānanda cetiyacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā pasannacittā kālaṃ karissanti,
anya-e0901n0:244_1: sabbete kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissanti hu –

anya-e0901n0:248_0: Pucchā – mahāsudassanasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:249_1: tissaṃyeva bhante kusinārāyaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:249_2: āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “mā bhante bhagavā imasmiṃ khuddakanagarake
anya-e0901n0:250_5: ettha bahū khattiyamahāsālā brāhmaṇa mahāsālā gahapati mahāsālā tathāgate abhippasannā.
anya-e0901n0:251_1: bhagavā āvuso purimadivase pucchita vissajjitakkamena mahāsudassana suttantaṃ desetvā subhaddaṃnāma paribbājakaṃ
anya-e0901n0:252_1: yasmiṃ kho subhadda dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati,
anya-e0901n0:252_6: Ime ca subhadda bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṃ,
anya-e0901n0:252_8: evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā subhaddaṃ paribbājakaṃ buddhaveneyyesu pacchimaṃ sakkhisāvakaṃ vinesi.
anya-e0901n0:254_1: pacchime panāvuso kāle bhagavā āyasmato ānandassa kīdisaṃ vacanaṃ kathetvā,
anya-e0901n0:255_1: bhagavā bhante pacchime kāle āyasmato ānandassa siyā kho panānanda tumhākaṃ evamassa atītasatthukaṃ pāvacanaṃ
anya-e0901n0:255_2: natthi no satthāti evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ kathetvā,
anya-e0901n0:255_3: siyā kho pana bhikkhave ekabhikkhussāpi kaṅkhā vā vimati vā buddhe vā dhamme vā saṅghe vā magge vā paṭipadāya vāti evamādinā bhikkhū pavāretvā,
anya-e0901n0:255_5: vayadhammā saṅkhārā appamādena sampādethāti pacchimañca ovādavacanaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āmantetvā,
anya-e0901n0:255_7: catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
anya-e0901n0:256_0: Nāvuso ānanda bhagavā parinibbuto, saññāvedayita nirodhaṃ samāpanno.
anya-e0901n0:258_2: janavasabhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:259_1: nātike bhante giñjakāvasathe āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:259_2: āyasmā bhante ānando māgadhake paricārake ārabbha bhagavato sammukhā parikathaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0901n0:261_0: Pucchā – mahāgovindasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:264_0: Pucchā – mahāsamayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:267_0: Pucchā – sakkapañhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:268_1: magadhesu bhante pācīnato rājagahassa ambasaṇḍā nāma brāhmaṇagāmo,
anya-e0901n0:268_2: tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasālaguhāyaṃ sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:268_3: sakko bhante devānamindo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0901n0:270_0: Pucchā – mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:271_0: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:273_0: Pucchā – pāyāsi suttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:274_1: kosalesu bhante setabyānāma kosalānaṃ nagaraṃ uttarena setabyaṃ siṃsapāvane āyasmatā kumārakassapena pāyāsiṃ rājaññaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:274_2: pāyāsissa bhante rājaññassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
anya-e0901n0:274_3: itipi natthi paroloko natthi sattā opapātikā natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākoti,
anya-e0901n0:275_1: tatthāvuso pāyāsissa rājaññassa diṭṭhipakāsanāca āyasmato kumārakassapattherassa diṭṭhiviniveṭṭhanakathā ca anekavāraṃ āgatā,
anya-e0901n0:275_2: tatthāvuso paṭhamaṃ pāyāsi rājañño attano diṭṭhiṃ kathaṃ pakāsesi,
anya-e0901n0:276_1: pāyāsi bhante rājañño āyasmantaṃ kumārakassapaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “ahañhi bho kassapa evaṃ vādī evaṃ diṭṭhī itipi natthi paroloko,
anya-e0901n0:276_4: evaṃ kho bhante pāyāsirājañño attano micchādiṭṭhiṃ āyasmato kumārakassapassa santike pakāsesi.
anya-e0901n0:276_5: Āyasmā ca kumārakassapo sakkhikāraṇaṃ candimasūriyaupamaṃ dassetvā pāyāsissa rājaññassa taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ viniveṭhesi.
anya-e0901n0:277_1: sādhu kho āvuso āyasmā kumārakassapo pāyāsissa rājaññassa micchādiṭṭhikassa saddhammavimukhibhūtassa
anya-e0901n0:277_2: paccakkhato paralokaṃ dassetvā taṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ viniveṭhesi.
anya-e0901n0:278_1: atha panāvuso pāyāsirājañño dutiyampi kīdisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:278_2: kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:279_1: dutiye pana bhante pāyāsirājañño attano mittāmacce ñātisālohite duccaritasamaṅgino kālaṃkate sādhakapariyāyaṃ
anya-e0901n0:279_3: āyasmā ca kumārakassapo coraupamāya taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:280_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:281_1: atha panāvuso pāyāsirājañño tatiyampi kīdisaṃ sādhaka pariyāyaṃ dassetvā attanovādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:281_2: kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggaha niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:282_1: tatiyampana bhante pāyāsirājañño attano mittāmacce ñātisālohite sucaritasamaṅgino kālaṃkate dassetvā attano micchāvādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:282_2: āyasmā ca kumārakassapo gūthakūpe patapurisopamāya taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:283_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:284_1: āyasmatā āvuso kumārakassapena purimadivase pucchitavissajjitakkamena gūthakūpapurisaupamāya micchāvādaṃ
anya-e0901n0:285_0: Catutthaṃ vā pañcamaṃ vā kīdisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attanovādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:285_1: kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo sahadhammena taṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:286_1: pāyāsi bhante rājañño āyasmatā kumārakassapena gūthakūpe nimuggapuriso pamāya micchāvādaṃ suniggahitaṃ
anya-e0901n0:286_2: niggahetvā dhammavāde patiṭṭhāpite catutthaṃ vā pañcamaṃ vā attano mittāmacce ñātisālohite samādinna
anya-e0901n0:286_3: pañcasīle sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano micchāvādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:286_4: Āyasmā ca kumārakassapo tāvatiṃsadevopamāya ca jaccandhopamāya cāti dvīhi upamāhi taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā,
anya-e0901n0:287_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ kumārakassapo pāyāsissa rājaññassa dve upamāyo dassetvā uppannaṃ pāpakaṃ micchāvādaṃ
anya-e0901n0:288_1: atha panāvuso pāyāsirājañño chaṭṭhaṃpi kīdisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:288_2: kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo sahadhammena taṃ micchāvādaṃ suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:289_1: chaṭṭhaṃ pana bhante pāyāsirājañño sīlavante samaṇabrāhmaṇe kalyāṇadhamme jīvitukāme amaritukāme
anya-e0901n0:290_0: Sukhakāme dukkhapaṭikūle sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:290_1: āyasmāca kumārakassapo gabbhinī upamāya taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:291_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo gabbhinīupamaṃ dassetvā taṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:292_1: atha panāvuso pāyāsirājañño sattamaṃpi kīdisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:292_2: kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:293_1: sattamaṃ pana bhante pāyāsirājañño kubbhiyaṃ pakkhipitvā māritapurisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:293_2: āyasmāca kumārakassapo supinakūpamāya taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:294_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo supinakūpamaṃ dassetvā uppannaṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:295_1: atha panāvuso pāyāsirājañño aṭṭhamampi navamampi kathetabbaṃ kathetvā dasamaṃ kīdisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:295_2: kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo sahadhammena taṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭinissajjāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:296_1: aṭṭhamampi bhante navamampi pāyāsirājañño yaṃ vā taṃ vā pariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:296_2: dasamaṃ pana bhante pāyāsirājañño chaviādīni chinditvā māritapurisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:296_3: āyasmā ca kumārakassapo aggikajaṭilopamāya taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:297_0: Paṭinissajjetaṃ rājañña pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ. Paṭinissajjetaṃ rājañña pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ.
anya-e0901n0:298_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo opāyikaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā taṃ pāpikaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:298_2: yaṃ tassa bhaveyya dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
anya-e0901n0:299_1: āyasmatā āvuso kumārakassapena purimadivase pucchitavissajjitākārena pāyāsissa rājaññassa aggikajaṭilopamaṃ
anya-e0901n0:299_2: dassetvā tasmiṃ pāpake diṭṭhigate paṭinissajjāpite so tāva therassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā kīdisañca paccanīkakathaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0901n0:299_3: kathañca thero karuṇāsītalahadayo hutvā aparampi upamaṃ dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:300_1: pāyāsi bhante rājañño āyasmatā kumārakassapena aggikajaṭilopamaṃ dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpite kiñcāpi bhavaṃ kassapo evamāha,
anya-e0901n0:300_2: atha kho nevāhaṃ sakkomi idaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjitunti evamādikaṃ paccanīkakathaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0901n0:300_3: thero ca bhante kumārakassapo dve satthavāhopamaṃ dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭinissajjāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:301_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo pāyāsissa rājaññassa dve satthavāhopamampi dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:301_2: tañhi tassa ca tadanuyāyīnañca bhaveyya dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
anya-e0901n0:302_1: evaṃ panāvuso āyasmatā kumārakassapena yathā vuttāhi bahūhi upamāhi ca aparāhi gūthabhārikaakkhadhuttakopamāhi
anya-e0901n0:302_2: ca tasmiṃ pāpake diṭṭhigate vissajjāpite so tāva therassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvāva pacchimapaṭikkhepavasena
anya-e0901n0:302_4: kathañca thero karuṇāsītalahadayo hutvā pacchimampi upamaṃ dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:303_1: pāyāsi bhante rājañño evaṃ therena nānāupamāhi tasmiṃ pāpake diṭṭhigate paṭinissajjāpitepi purimanayeneva therassa paccanīkakathaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0901n0:303_2: theropi ca bhante pacchimaṃ sāṇabhārikūpamaṃ dassetvā karuṇāsītalahadayo taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpesi.
anya-e0901n0:304_1: sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo pāyāsissa rājaññassa sāṇabhārikopamampi dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpesi,
anya-e0901n0:304_2: tañhi tassa ca tadanuyāyīnañca bhaveyya dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
anya-e0901n0:305_1: imāya panāvuso pacchimikāya sāṇabhārikopamāya dassitāya pāyāsirājañño therassa dhammadesanānubhāvena
anya-e0901n0:305_2: imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno hutvā kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi,
anya-e0901n0:306_1: imāya ca pana bhante upamāya dassitāya pāyāsi rājañño “purimeneva ahaṃ opammena bhoto kassapassa attamano
anya-e0901n0:306_2: abhiraddho evamādinā bhante pāyāsirājañño imasmiṃ dhammavinaye āyasmato kumārakassapassa dhammadesanāya
anya-e0901n0:306_4: Icchāmi cāhaṃ bho kassapa mahāyaññaṃ yajituṃ,
anya-e0901n0:306_5: anusāsatu maṃ bhavaṃ kassapo yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti pāyāsi rājañño āyasmantaṃ kumārakassapaṃ anusāsaniṃ yāci,
anya-e0901n0:306_6: āyasmā ca bhante kumārakassapo dukkhette dubbhūme pavuttabījopamāya dussīlesu dinnadānassa na mahapphalabhāvaṃ
anya-e0901n0:306_7: dassetvā sukhette subhūme pavuttabījopamāya sīlavantesu dinnadānassa mahapphalabhāvaṃ dassetvā pāyāsiṃ
anya-e0901n0:307_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso pāyāsirājañño dānaṃ adāsi, kathañcassa samparāyo ahosi.
anya-e0901n0:308_5: so asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā asahatthā dānaṃ datvā acittīkataṃ dānaṃ datvā apaviddhaṃ dānaṃ datvā kāyassabhedā
anya-e0901n0:308_6: paraṃ maraṇā cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajji suññaṃ serīsakaṃ vimānaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:309_1: tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena pāthiyavagge paṭhamaṃ pāthiyasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:310_1: mallesu bhante anupiye nāma mallānaṃ nigame bhaggavagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:310_2: bhaggavagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “purimāni bhante divasāni purimatarāni sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0901n0:310_3: upasaṅkamitvā maṃ etadavoca “paccakkhāto dāni mayā bhaggava bhagavā,
anya-e0901n0:312_0: Pucchā – udumbarikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:313_1: rājagahe bhante nigrodhaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:313_2: nigrodho bhante paribbājako bhagavato parammukhā bhagavantaṃyeva ārabbha anekavihitaṃ abhūtakathaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0901n0:315_0: Pucchā – cakkavattisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:316_1: magadhesu bhante mātulāyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha attajjhāsayena suttanikkhepena bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:318_0: Pucchā – aggaññasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:319_1: sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde vāseṭṭhaṃ pabbajitaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:319_2: brāhmaṇā bhante vāseṭṭha bhāradvāje pabbajite akkosanti paribhāsanti attarūpāya
anya-e0901n0:320_0: Paribhāsāya paripuṇṇāya no aparipuṇṇāya, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:321_0: Pucchā – sampasādanīya suttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:322_0: Vissajjanā – nāḷandāyaṃ bhante pāvārikambavane āyasmatā sāriputtena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:324_0: Pucchā – pāsādikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:325_1: sakkesu bhante vedhaññānāma sakyānaṃ ambavane pāsāde cundaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:325_2: cundo bhante samaṇuddeso pāvāyaṃ nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa kālaṃ kiriyāya bhinnānaṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ dvedhikajātānaṃ
anya-e0901n0:325_3: bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitujjanakāraṇaṃ āyasmato ānandassa ārocesi,
anya-e0901n0:325_4: āyasmā ca bhante ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi,
anya-e0901n0:327_0: Pucchā – lakkhaṇasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:330_0: Pucchā – siṅgālasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:331_1: rājagahe bhante siṅgālaṃ gahapatiputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:331_2: siṅgālo bhante gahapatiputto kālasseva uṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā allavattho allakeso pañjaliko puthudisā
anya-e0901n0:331_3: namassati puratthimaṃ disaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ pacchimaṃ disaṃ uttaraṃ disaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ disaṃ uparimaṃ disaṃ,
anya-e0901n0:333_0: Pucchā – āṭānāṭiyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:334_2: bhagavati bhante rājagahe viharati cattāro mahārājāno catuddisaṃ rakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā catuddisaṃ gumbaṃ ṭhapetvā
anya-e0901n0:334_3: catuddisaṃ ovaraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā kevalakappaṃ gijjhakūṭapabbataṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu,
anya-e0901n0:334_5: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho bhante vessavaṇo mahārājā āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ bhagavato ārocesi bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ phāsuvihārāya,
anya-e0901n0:336_0: Pucchā – saṅgīti suttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:337_0: Vissajjanā – pāvāyaṃ bhante āyasmatā sāriputtena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:339_0: Pucchā – dasuttarasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:340_1: dasuttarasuttaṃ bhante campāyaṃ gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre āyasmatā sāriputtena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n0:342_0: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
